column2: Lie your baby on their back after washing them or changing their diaper.
Tell them the sun is coming! Wiggle your fingers like sun rays above their head and make your face a big smiling sun.
Tell them the wind is coming! Blow softly over their body.
Tell them the rain is coming! Use your fingers to gently pat over their whole body like light raindrops.
Tell them the clouds are coming! Wrap the towel or cloth around them like a blanket and cuddle them.
Play with different weathers. Which one does your baby like best?
Add sound effects or make it into a little song. Use the tune of another song you know! ",,,,,,,,,,,,,,,ca58b40b-c642-4603-8c2b-67e58d3ae801,,execute_actions,;
